peril.views.slick.io

Class MapReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.io.FileParser
      • peril.views.slick.io.MapReader

  • public final class MapReader
extends FileParser
    Reader the map from a specified SaveFile and uses that to construct the SlickBoard and all its SlickCountrys, SlickContinents, SlickUnits. In addition of this it restores the state of the game.
    Since:
    2018-03-15
    Version:
    1.01.05
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy, Joseph_Rolli
    See Also:
    FileParser, SaveFile

      • MapReader

        public MapReader(java.lang.String mapName,
                 GameController game,
                 SaveFile file)
        Constructs a new MapReader.
        Parameters:
        mapName - The name of the map.
        game - The GameController that allows the MapReader to interact with the game.
        file - The SaveFile that contains the map to be loaded.
